articles.title: Astonishing 15-Million-Year-Old Spider Fossil Is The Second Largest Ever Found - IFLScience
articles.description: It was five times bigger than its living relatives.
articles.content: A spider bonanza kicked off in Australia during the Miocene at a time when a change in the climate dried up the landscape. This gave a group of spiders called mygalomorph spiders an opportunity to di… [+2644 chars]

articles.title: Amazon’s Echo Show 8 Photos Edition makes the smart display a digital photo frame - The Verge
articles.description: The new Photo Mode costs $1.99 a month and makes your photos the primary content. It also adds 25GB of photo and video storage from Amazon Photos.
articles.content:
